document.description: I just ordered 4 Medium size trays for a small party at work tomorrow and it's no problem for them to have the food ready for pick up at 12 noon the next day.

3 reviews in English
Review from Jamie P.
1 friend 16 reviews
Jamie P.
Los Angeles, CA 7/2/2008 Small Filipino Fast Food Eatery with a small choice of already made items. They only serve lunch on Tuesday through Friday.
The majority of their business is catering. Their Shanghai lumpia is a good party dish which are small all meat egg rolls. I've ordered this and brought it to all different types of parties and the people are all over it.
Good pancit, crispy chicken and their Turon for dessert is not over sweetened with syrup and is real tasty.
This is the only Filipino restaurant/catering in Highland Park so all you Highland Park folks come on and support your local Flips.
Nice family who will work hard and prepare a good dish for you. I just ordered 4 Medium size trays for a small party at work tomorrow and it's no problem for them to have the food ready for pick up at 12 noon the next day.
So give it a try and say hello to Minda.
Their located in a small plaza next to a dentist and coin operated laundry.
Was this review…?
Useful (1) Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Joe W.
3 friends 47 reviews
Joe W.
Temple City, CA 11/30/2011 Why only one star? Because a group of co-workers ordered Lumpia's from Fiesta and when we drove all the way from the City of Commerce, the place was closed. The owner had totally forgotten about us coming when we called. While he was cordial and all, it left a bad taste in my mouth. I will give them another try and if they actually are there when they say they will be, I will adjust the review.
Was this review…?
Useful Funny Cool
Add owner comment Bookmark Send to a Friend Link to This Review
Review from Cheryl L.
44 friends 152 reviews
Cheryl L.
Inland Empire 7/8/2010 1 Check-in Here I'm writing about the Lumpia Shanghai-- that's it... That's because their lumpia at Fiesta is out of this world! You bring it to a party, and seriously, it's gone before you can even get to them! Each tray is about 100 pieces for $20.00 and comes w/ the sweet chili dipping sauce. Call ahead to order them- and they will be ready for pickup. My mom goes here all the time and this was my first to do the pickup-- the service is really friendly and you can tell that they are family run and hard working. Although not in the best of neighborhoods, at least there is a parking lot so you don't have to park far!
